Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A set of $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) bagpipes, the main features include three $(this.trait:wood:material) drones, made to look like shawms without finger holes that emit a low droning sound, a $(this.trait:wood:material) chanter, which similarly resembles a shawm with finger holes, and a $(this.trait:wood:material) blowpipe, purposefully guiding the input of air into the airtight leather bag, of which makes up the body of the instrument. Once the sealed bag is fully inflated, one might either blow in more air, or squeeze the bag within their armpit so that the air circulates out through the $(this.trait:wood:material) drones and $(this.trait:wood:material) chanter.

A set of $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) bagpipes consisting of three $(this.trait:wood:material) pipes, formally known as drones, a $(this.trait:wood:material) chanter, of which resembles a shawm, and a $(this.trait:wood:material) blowpipe. All of these are sewn into a sealed leather bag so as circulate the air out of the drones and chanter and in through the blowpipe.
The airtight leather bag of the bagpipes, the body, holds the air that is blown in from the blowpipe and out through the drones and chanter.
A sealed leather bag, used to contain the air that moves throughout the bagpipes.
A $(this.trait:wood:material) blowpipe crafted specifically for the purpose of guiding air into the bagpipes.
A $(this.trait:wood:material) blowpipe, made as an input of air.
A $(this.trait:wood:material) chanter used to create the melody with the use of the finger holes provided.
A $(this.trait:wood:material) chanter, this resembles that of a shawm instrument.
A set of three $(this.trait:wood:material) drones, while resembling shawms without finger holes, they emit a deep droning sound.
A set of three $(this.trait:wood:material) drones, these resemble shawms without finger holes.
Some $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) tassels. These balls of material hang from each of the individual drones.
Some $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) tassels that drape down from the various drones.
